文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_038_chunk8
证据片段: We tried various lubricants initially, but it turned out that none is required. Our experience showed that it is advisable to perform the elasticity loading-unloading procedures two to three times and to make sure there is no hypoteresis in the elastic region. Any misalignment seems to induce hysteresis loops.
